articles.content: Welcome back to The State of AI, a new collaboration between the Financial Times and MIT Technology Review . articles.title: How to orchestrate agents using mission control
articles.description: Run multiple Copilot agents from one place. Learn prompt techniques, how to spot drift early, and how to review agent work efficiently. The post How to orchestrate agents using mission control appeared first on The GitHub Blog .
articles.content: We recently shipped Agent HQ’s mission control , a unified interface for managing GitHub Copilot coding agent tasks. Now, you can now assign tasks to Copilot across repos, pick a custom agent, watch real‑time session logs, steer mid-run (pause, refine, or restart), and jump straight into the resulting pull requests—all in one place. Instead of bouncing between pages to see status, rationale, and changes, mission control centralizes assignment, oversight, and review. Having the
articles.author: Matt Nigh

articles.title: The ping pong movie is very stressful
articles.description: The origins of table tennis have often obscured its influence - it was literally designed to be the diminutive form of tennis, after all. But the idea of "spin" first originated with ping pong; politically, it would become the thing that opened up negotiations between the US and China under Nixon. T
articles.content: The origins of table tennis have often obscured its influence - it was literally designed to be the diminutive form of tennis, after all. But the idea of "spin" first originated with ping pong; politically, it would become the thing that opened up negotiations between the US and China under Nixon. There are gestures to this in Marty Supreme , but the new film from Josh Safdie is more interested in the sport as a fixture for outcasts in the '50s Lower East Side. Loosely based on the true story of
articles.author: Kevin Nguyen

The government order was privately sent out to phone manufacturers on Novemb
articles.content: Indiaâ€™s Department of Telecommunications is giving phone manufacturers 90 days to comply with an order to pre-install a state-owned app on new phones and push it to existing phones through software updates, reports Reuters . The government order was privately sent out to phone manufacturers on November 28th, according to Reuters , including Apple, Samsung, Vivo, Oppo, and Xiaomi. In August, Russia issued a similar order requiring phone manufacturers to preload a state-backed messenger app, Max.

articles.title: Revisiting Jill of the Jungle, the last game Tim Sweeney designed
articles.description: DOS platformers didn't have a reputation for being fun, but this one is a blast.
articles.content: Boy, was 1992 a different time for computer games. Epic MegaGamesâ€™ Jill of the Jungle illustrates that as well as any other title from the era. Designed and programmed by Epic Games CEO Tim Sweeney, the game was meant to prove that console-style games of the original Nintendo era could work just as well on PCs. (Later, the onus of proof would often be in the reverse direction.) Also, it had a female protagonist, which Sweeney saw as a notable differentiator at the time. Thatâ€™s pretty wild to thi
articles.author: Samuel Axon
